attributes.additional_details:
The government must spend a fortune on lighting the motorways, duel carriageways and other A roads.

Cars, trucks and motorbikes all have lights on them.  There is no need to be spending money on lighting these roads.

If there are particular accident black spots then fine have some lights.  But we dont need to light every motorway or duel carriageway in the county.

If this is deemed too extreme, then at least turn them off from 11pm to 5am when there is only light use.
